name: nextjs-browser-extension
description: Browser extension for Chrome and Firefox built in Next.js/React
author: Tom SÃ¶derlund <tom@tomsoderlund.com>

scripts.zip-extension: cp ./public/manifest.json ./out; mv ./out/_next ./out/next; cd ./out && grep -rli '_next' * | xargs -I@ sed -i '' 's/_next/next/g' @; mkdir ../extension; zip -r -FS ../extension/myExtension.zip *;
scripts.build-extension: yarn clean; next build && yarn zip-extension
